item.description:
May the odds be ever in your favor!

We discussed it as part of book club for February, and now the movie's here.

Let's plan on meeting up at the theater around 4pm for the showing at 4:20 - that gives everyone a chance to get tickets if they didn't pre-buy them already*.

After the movie's over we can go and get dinner elsewhere in Harvard Square.

*It's highly recommended you pre-buy a ticket for this one - the movie's already broken ticket sales records and they just became available today (2/24/12).
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the massive crowd of us outside the theater - I'll be wearing a red shirt.
item.name: The Hunger Games
